title: You can select all your typed text by tapping thrice on iOS
content:
If all I know is that I don’t know anything, that means I actually know loads. Let me illustrate. I’ve been on iOS since the iPhone 4, meaning I’ve been using Apple’s mobile devices for around 12 years. On top of that, I’ve been covering and analyzing the company as part of my actual job for a long old while. Yet, I was today years old when I realized that you can select all your text while typing by tapping your iPhone screen three times. Truly, the breadth of my lack of knowledge is breathtaking. This is me tapping the…

This story continues at The Next Web

Or just read more coverage about: iOS
description: Want to know how you can quickly select all your typed text on iOS? Easy! Just tap that screen three times, friend.
